_source.text: After a period of public bloodletting, Robb Flynn (who does that better than anyone) announced that Machine Head were holding auditions for a new bassist to cover the band for the Mayhem Festival tour.

text: After a period of public **bloodletting**, Robb Flynn (who does that **better** **than** anyone) announced that
Machine Head were **holding** auditions for a new bassist to cover the band for the Mayhem Festival tour.
